devdoc.author: PoolTogether Inc Team
devdoc.details: If the history param has single PrizeTierV2 struct with a "drawId" of 1 all subsequent Draws will use that PrizeTierV2 struct for PrizeDitribution calculations. The BinarySearchLib will find a PrizeTierV2 using a "atOrBefore" range search when supplied drawId input parameter.

claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

returns._0: The number of prize tiers that have been pushed
Draw ID of the last recorded PrizeTier record
Draw ID of first PrizeTierV2 record

params.index: Index at which to get the prize tier

returns._0: Draw ID of the PrizeTierV2 that was pushed

push((uint8,uint32,uint32,uint32,uint32,.details: Callable only by the owner or manager.`drawId` must be greater than the latest one stored in `history`.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

CEILING.details: It's fixed point 9 because 1e9 is the largest "1" that fits into 2**32

history.details: The history, with sequentially ordered ids, can be searched using binary search. The binary search will find index of a drawId (atOrBefore) using a specific drawId (at). When a new Draw ID is added to the history, a corresponding mapping of the ID is updated in the prizeTiers mapping.

prizeTiers.details: The prizeTiers mapping links a Draw ID to a PrizeTierV2 struct. The prizeTiers mapping is updated when a new Draw ID is added to the history.

devdoc.title: PoolTogether V4 PrizeTierHistoryV2

PrizeTierPushed(uint32,(uint8,uint32,uin.notice: Emit when new PrizeTierV2 is added to history

PrizeTierSet(uint32,(uint8,uint32,uint32.notice: Emitted when existing PrizeTierV2 is updated in history

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

count().notice: Returns the number of Prize Tier structs pushed

getNewestDrawId().notice: Read last Draw ID stored in the history.

getOldestDrawId().notice: Read first Draw ID used to initialize history

getPrizeTier(uint32).notice: Read PrizeTierHistory struct from history array.

getPrizeTierAtIndex(uint256).notice: Get prize tier at the specified `index`.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

popAndPush((uint8,uint32,uint32,uint32,u.notice: Pop the latest prize tier stored in the `prizeTiers` array and replace it with the new prize tier.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

userdoc.notice: The PrizeTierHistoryV2 smart contract stores a history of PrizeTierV2 structs linked to a range of valid Draw IDs.
